title: Young street trees planted in winter 2017/2018

content:
Re – Freedom of Information Request – Reference – FOI / 73
Dear Nicholaus Hall,
Thank you for your recent request for information relating to Trees
Planted which we received on 11/04/18.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request, and will be
dealt with under the Freedom of Information Act.  The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act states that we must respond to you within
20 working days, therefore, you should expect to hear a response from us
by 10/05/18.
In the meantime, if you have any queries please contact us on the number
below.
Thank you.
Yours sincerely,
Resources Business Support
Moorfoot Level 2 North Wing
Sheffield S1 4PL
Tel : 0114 2734427
E-mail : [1][Sheffield City Council request email]
P Please don't print this e-mail unless you really need to
_____________________________________________
From: Nicholaus Hall
[[2]mailto:[FOI #477085 email]]
Sent: 11 April 2018 01:16
To: FOI
Subject: Freedom of Information request - Young street trees planted in
winter 2017/2018
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please provide the total number of young trees planted on Sheffield's
streets over the October 2017 to March 2018 planting season.
Further, please break this number down as follows:
1. The number replacing felled mature street trees; 2. The number
replacing failed young trees; 3. The number replacing damaged young trees;
4. The number planted in new locations.
Do feel free to contact me should you require any clarification regarding
the above.
Yours faithfully,
Nicholaus Hall
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Please use this email address for all replies to this request:
[3][FOI #477085 email]
Is [4][Sheffield City Council request email] the wrong address for Freedom of Information
requests to Sheffield City Council? If so, please contact us using this
form:
[5]
https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/change_re...
Disclaimer: This message and any reply that you make will be published on
the internet. Our privacy and copyright policies:

https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/help/offi...
For more detailed guidance on safely disclosing information, read the
latest advice from the ICO:
[7]
https://www.whatdotheyknow.com/help/ico-...
Please note that in some cases publication of requests and responses will
be delayed.
If you find this service useful as an FOI officer, please ask your web
manager to link to us from your organisation's FOI page.
show quoted sections

Dear Mr Hall,
Thank you for your recent request for information relating to Trees
Planted which we received on 11/04/2018.
Please find below, Sheffield City Council’s response to your request:
Please provide the total number of young trees planted on Sheffield's
streets over the October 2017 to March 2018 planting season - 811
Further, please break this number down as follows:
1. The number replacing felled mature street trees = 677
2. The number replacing failed young trees = 33
3. The number replacing damaged young trees = 42
4. The number planted in new locations.  All replacement trees planted to
replace those trees removed are detailed above.
We have therefore assumed that question 4 relates to additional trees
planted, including trees planted to replace those removed prior to the
Streets Ahead contract starting = 59
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed.  You can ask for an
internal review by either writing to the above address or by emailing
[1][Sheffield City Council request email].
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioners Office. The Information
Commissioner can be contacted at: The Information Commissioner's Office,
Wycliffe House, Water Lane, Wilmslow, Cheshire, SK9 5AF, telephone 0303
123 1113, or for further details see their website [2]www.ico.org.uk
Kind Regards,
Resources Business Support
Moorfoot Level 2 North Wing
Sheffield S1 4PL
Tel : 0114 2734427
E-mail : [3][Sheffield City Council request email]
P Please don't print this e-mail unless you really need to
_____________________________________________
